THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE
FOLLOWING:

2019/KER/1026
Crl.MC.No. 170 of 2019
1i2..
ORDER
Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. The petitioner is the accused in CC No. 1673
of 2017 on the file of the Judicial First
Class Magistrate Court-II, Kannur. His only
request is to direct the magistrate to dispose
of Annexure-II application filed by him under
Section 239 Cr.P.C.

3. After hearing both sides, I am satisfied that
the request is reasonable.

In the result, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of
directing the learned magistrate to dispose of
Annexure-II application within two months from
the date of receipt or production of a copy of
this order, whichever is earlier.

Sd/-

K.ABRAHAM MATHEW
JUDGE
Bka/10.01.2019
